title: ITV’s This Morning star Ashley James resigns as Girlguiding ambassador due to trans ban
description: ITV’s This Morning star Ashley James has resigned as a Girlguiding ambassador due to its recent ban on trans girls. On Tuesday (2 December), national governing charity Girlguiding, which oversees girl guide groups in the UK, announced it had made the “difficu…
content:
